page.shortlink: api client api a5 d date relative generate hour method

argument.name: hour
argument.description: The delta in hours between two dates.

return.name: hour
return.description: The correctly formatted representation of the delta in hours.

page.description: Method used to generate how hours should be representation in a relative date. For example turning "1" into "1 hour", and "3" into "3 hours". See *[link:Date.toRelative]*.
